item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Buddha’s words of Dhamma: Paṇḍito sīlasampanno jalaṃ aggīva bhāsati; bhoge saṃharamānassa bhamarasseva irīyato. Dīgha Nikāya 3.265 English translation: One who is virtuous and wise shines forth like a blazing fire; like a bee collecting nectar one acquires wealth by harming none. Sharing a wonderful documentary: https://vimeo.com/ondemand/queenofthesun
